properties.name: apollo.autoUpdateInjectedSpringProperties
properties.description: whether to auto update spring placeholder or not.

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.enabled
properties.description: enable injecting namespaces in bootstrap phase.

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.namespaces
properties.description: namespaces to be injected during bootstrap phase, multiple namespaces should be comma-separated.

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.eagerLoad.enabled
properties.description: enable apollo initialization before logging system initialization.

properties.name: apollo.override-system-properties
properties.description: enable apollo server config override system properties.

properties.name: apollo.cache-dir
properties.description: local cache directory. the default value on windows is 'c:\opt\data', while on mac/linux is '/opt/data'.

properties.name: apollo.config-service
properties.description: apollo config service address. if it's configured apollo client will not refresh config services from remote meta service.

properties.name: apollo.client.monitor.external.type
properties.description: apollo client monitor external monitoring system type.

properties.name: apollo.client.monitor.external.export-period
properties.description: apollo client monitor external metrics export period.

properties.name: app.id
properties.description: apollo client app id. if it's empty apollo will only load public namespace configurations!.
